content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the menus of the restaurants in Telemark or Oslo, but it is common for Norwegian restaurants to offer vegetarian options on their menus. However, it's always a good idea to ask about specific vegetarian options or dietary restrictions when making a reservation or ordering at the restaurant. Some popular vegetarian options in Norwegian cuisine include platters of roasted and pickled vegetables, potato-based dishes like lefse, and various types of soups and salads.
